events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like a refund as soon as possible. The product does not match what I purchased.
The customer's request was reviewed and the issue was identified as related to a refund for an incorrect product delivery.
The case was assigned to the refund department agent specializing in order discrepancies and reimbursement.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m sorry to hear that you received the wrong item. Let me assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and the packing slip to help us process your refund quickly?
I've attached the photo of the item and the packing slip as requested. Please let me know if you need any additional information.
Thank you for the photos. We will process your refund immediately, and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the prompt response and solution. I appreciate the quick handling of my refund request.
The refund has been completed on our end. Please check your account in the next few days and contact us if there are any further issues.
We wanted to follow up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I received my refund today. Thank you for the excellent support throughout the process.
The case is now closed as the refund was successfully completed and the customer has confirmed receipt.
